name: efx
tagline: efx make javafx application develepment easily
body:
efx
===

A little framework for writing JavaFX 2.0+ applications. Its major usage is form validation.For a quick start,you can take a look at efx.sample.form.groovy.PersonFormApp

### Authors and Contributors
Franklyn Donald(@groovyefx)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
